short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Button to go to Daily Notes in Roam Research when left sidebar is hidden

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: If you're like me, you like to keep the left sidebar hidden in Roam. However, you still want to be able to quickly go back to your Daily Notes (or "home"). This is a button for you.
